name: Cashtronauts
description: Take to the stars and smuggle, shoot, scavenge and steal your way to wealth and glory! Cashtronauts is fast-paced space capitalism at its finest. How are you going to make your millions?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.9 GHz Memory: 6 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 210 MB available space Additional Notes: Note: For smooth framerates during splitscreen multiplayer better hardware is recommended.
